mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_ID , POST_WRITER , POST_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , POST_DATE , RELEASE_START_DATE , RELEASE_END_DATE , DELETE_YN FROM NOTICE WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY RELEASE_END_DATE DESC

SELECT NOTICE_ID , POST_WRITER , POST_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , POST_DATE , RELEASE_START_DATE , RELEASE_END_DATE , DELETE_YN , ON_OFF FROM NOTICE WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' AND RELEASE_START_DATE <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND RELEASE_END_DATE >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY RELEASE_END_DATE ASC

SELECT NOTICE_ID , POST_WRITER , POST_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , POST_DATE , RELEASE_START_DATE , RELEASE_END_DATE , DELETE_YN , ON_OFF FROM NOTICE WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' AND (RELEASE_START_DATE > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') OR RELEASE_END_DATE < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) ORDER BY RELEASE_END_DATE DESC
SELECT NOTICE_ID , POST_WRITER , POST_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , POST_DATE , RELEASE_START_DATE , RELEASE_END_DATE , DELETE_YN , ON_OFF FROM NOTICE WHERE DELETE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY RELEASE_END_DATE ASC

SELECT NOTICE_ID , POST_WRITER , POST_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(POST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') POST_DATE , RELEASE_START_DATE , RELEASE_END_DATE , DELETE_YN , ON_OFF FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_ID = #{_parameter}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE ( NOTICE_ID , POST_WRITER , POST_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , POST_DATE , RELEASE_START_DATE , RELEASE_END_DATE , DELETE_YN) VALUES ( 'NT-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(SEQ_NOTICE_PK.NEXTVAL, 6, 0) , #{postWriter} , #{postTitle} , #{noticeContent} , SYSDATE , #{releaseStartDate} , #{releaseEndDate} , 'N')
